library.description: jsy is lightweight JavaScript Library contains the missing javascript functions
library.name: jsy

library.description: KoolChart offers 90+ types of charts, which have animation, 3D and gradient effects. Beyond the basic offerings, KoolChart provides advanced functions and chart types such as real-time monitoring chart, target vs actual chart, slide chart and candlestick chart in a single product package.
library.name: Koolchart

library.description:
Frame.js is a flow control library and script loader for Javascript applications.

Frame includes and acts as an interface for the LABjs library loader. So you can use Frame to load script libraries from both local and remote servers, cross-browser, with no cross-site scripting restrictions.

While many function sequencers exist, Frame.js focuses on application-level synchronous function management, includes a library loader to mix-and-match between remote scripts, local scripts, and functions, and provides a basic set of debugging and unit testing tools.

Frame is like require.js, but designed for the frontend, with debugging tools, and it clocks in at just under 11k (compared to require.js's minified 25k).
library.name: Frame.js

library.description:
dhtmlxGantt is an interactive JavaScript Gantt chart library for building feature-rich and editable apps for managing the projects.

With dhtmlxGantt you'll get:


Full control with JavaScript API
Smart rendering
Undo/redo functionality
Accessibility
Auto Scheduling
Critical path calculation
Tasks Grouping
and much more
library.name: dhtmlxGantt

library.description: jTags are a unique way of building a highly dynamic, customizable and efficient website quickly and easily. With jTags you can embed functionality to the markup tags to make them perform a certain task.
library.name: jTags

library.description:
dhtmlxDiagram is a JavaScript diagram library that can help you with building nice diagrams and org charts org charts.

The library is fully customizable, cross-browser and can be simply integrated in any web app.
library.name: dhtmlxDiagram

library.description:
OLAPCharts is a programming free JavaScript Chart engine.

It contains all basic charts and a growing number of advanced charts and is fully interactive and responsive.

But the main focus lies on multidimensional data processing and transformation to make building dashboards easy.
library.name: OLAPCharts

library.description:
MindFusion JS Chart is an interactive library for charts and gauges written purely in JavaScript. It supports all common chart types and gauges, multiple series, custom data and rich styling capabilities. The elegant architecture of the library allows you to create dashboards, charts with multiple different types of series in a single plot, unlimited number of axes, reusable styling themes and financial charts. The innovative approach to data lets you define your own data classes by implementing a single interface. 
The library boasts a rich event set, zoom, pan and dragging of the legend. It is designed and implemented to provide JS developers with the perfect tool to create beautiful, interactive charts fast and easy.
Packed with the tool is a full-featured gauge library with numerous sample gauges and the ability to define any oval or linear gauge.
library.name: MindFusion JS Chart
